title: New: Share insights directly to Slack!
description: With the new free Matomo Slack plugin, you can share scheduled reports and custom alerts directly to your favourite Slack channels. Ensure no one misses the data that matters most by setting up automated reports and tailored alerts that go directly to Slack. This keeps your team updated, saves time, and makes it easier to monitor changes and respond promptly.

title: New Copy function - Custom Reports, Heatmaps, and more
description: A new a copy function is available across multiple features to make your setup faster and easier. Simply duplicate an existing item and settings are automatically copied - ready for you to adjust!

title: CustomReports - Now supports more than 3 dimensions
description: On-Premise Matomo users can now configure the maximum number of dimensions allowed in a custom report at the instance level. For example, you can adjust the maximum number of dimensions from 3 (default) to 6 or 10.

title: Funnels - Enhanced Analysis and Comparison Capabilities
description: Funnels now have an improved visualisation that provides a clear breakdown of proceeded visits, new entries, exits, and skipped steps at each stage, making it easier to identify areas for optimisation. The comparison functionality is improved to allow for a more useful analysis of funnel performance across different segments and date ranges.

title: New Plugin Alert: Never miss a bug again with Crash Analytics!
description: This powerful new Matomo On-Premise plugin automatically tracks JavaScript errors in real-time, allowing for rapid bug resolution. With custom alerts, scheduled crash reports and the ability to precisely trace the steps a web visitor took to generate a bug, you can enhance your website's reliability, boost conversion rates and ultimately drive revenue.
